SEARCH
Package rational

Class RationalAgent

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.Agent.AgentBESA
rational.RationalAgent
public abstract class RationalAgent extends BESA.Kernel.Agent.AgentBESA
The RationalAgent class is an abstract class that extends AgentBESA. It provides a base implementation for rational agents in the Rational Agent framework, including structure setup and agent lifecycle management.
